data_manipulation.psycopg2 package¶

Submodules¶

data_manipulation.psycopg2.psycopg2_ module¶

data_manipulation.psycopg2.psycopg2_.psy_pg_connect(host, database, username, password)[source]¶

Set up a connection to the postgres server

Parameters

  • host (str) – Hostname

  • database (str) – Database name

  • username (str) – Username

  • password (str) – Password

Returns

(connection, cursor)

Return type

tuple

data_manipulation.psycopg2.psycopg2_.query_to_pandas(sql_query, connection)[source]¶

Query result into Pandas dataframe

Parameters

  • sql_query (str) – SQL query

  • connection (str) – Connection return by psycopg2

Examples

>>> sql_query = '''SELECT * FROM users;'''
Returns

SQL results in Pandas dataframe

Return type

pandas.core.frame.DataFrame
